languages.text:
"Возрадуйтесь, ибо уже через десять оборотов Бессмертный Император ниспошлет благодать и заберет наших братьев и сестер во служение себе, на священную Терру!
Празднество Звездного Погребения начнется, как положено, на рассвете. Не забудьте оплатить пошлину, иначе вашим близким придется ждать следующего цикла, чтобы отправиться к Императору.
Также в этот священный день все рабочие часы уменьшены на один, дабы благословенные жители могли принять участие в шествии от Шпиля Императора до Шпиля Тишины".

traits.locale_text:
"Возрадуйтесь, ибо уже через десять оборотов Бессмертный Император ниспошлет благодать на Гордость Сантиэля и заберет наших братьев и сестер во служение себе, на священную Терру!
Празднество Звездного Погребения начнется, как положено, на рассвете. Не забудьте оплатить пошлину, иначе вашим близким придется ждать следующего цикла, чтобы отправиться к Императору.
Также в этот священный день все рабочие часы уменьшены на один, дабы благословенные жители Гордости Сантиэля могли принять участие в шествии от Шпиля Императора до Шпиля Тишины."

languages.text:
"Rejoice, for in ten turns the Immortal Emperor will bestow His grace upon us and embrace our brothers and sisters so they can serve Him on Holy Terra!
The Celestial Burial ceremony will commence at dawn, in full accordance with tradition. Remember to pay the fee so your loved ones do not have to wait for the next cycle before they can join the Emperor.
Additionally, on this holy day the number of work hours will be reduced by one so the blessed denizens may take part in the solemn march from the Emperor's Spire to the Spire of Stillness."

"Возрадуйтесь, ибо уже через десять оборотов Бессмертный Император ниспошлет благодать и заберет наших братьев и сестер во служение себе, на священную Терру!

traits.locale_text:
"Rejoice, for in ten cycles the Immortal Emperor will bestow his grace upon Santiel's Pride and embrace our brothers and sisters so they can serve him on Holy Terra!
The Celestial Burial ceremony starts at dawn, in full accordance with the tradition. Remember to pay the fee so your loved ones do not have to wait for the next cycle before they can join the Emperor.
Additionally, on this holy day the number of work hours will be reduced by one so the blessed denizens of Santiel's Pride could take part in the solemn march from the Emperor's Spire to the Spire of Stillness."

languages.text:
“欢呼吧，再过十个周期，不朽神皇就会赐予我们恩典，拥抱我们的兄弟姐妹，让他们在神圣泰拉为祂服务！
按照传统，天葬仪式将于黎明时分开始。请不要忘记支付费用，否则您的亲人恐怕要等到下个周期才能与帝皇团聚。
另外，在这个神圣的日子里，所有人的工作时间都缩短一个小时。这样一来，受祝福的臣民便可以参加庄严的游行，从帝皇尖塔一路游行至寂静尖塔。”
languages.original_text:
"Rejoice, for in ten turns the Immortal Emperor will bestow His grace upon us and embrace our brothers and sisters so they can serve Him on Holy Terra!
The Celestial Burial ceremony will commence at dawn, in full accordance with tradition. Remember to pay the fee so your loved ones do not have to wait for the next cycle before they can join the Emperor.
Additionally, on this holy day the number of work hours will be reduced by one so the blessed denizens may take part in the solemn march from the Emperor's Spire to the Spire of Stillness."

另外，在这个神圣的日子里，所有人的工作时间都缩短一个小时。这样一来，受祝福的臣民便可以参加庄严的游行，从帝皇尖塔一路游行至寂静尖塔。”

languages.text:
«¡Regocijaos, pues en diez turnos el Emperador inmortal nos otorgará Su gracia y abrazará a nuestros hermanos y hermanas para que puedan servirlo en la Sagrada Terra!
La ceremonia del Entierro Celestial comenzará al alba, tal y como dicta la tradición. Recordad pagar la tasa para que vuestros seres queridos no tengan que esperar al próximo ciclo para unirse al Emperador.
Además, en este santo día el número de horas de trabajo se reducirá en una para que los ciudadanos fieles puedan formar parte de la solemne marcha de la Aguja del Emperador a la Aguja de la Calma».
languages.original_text:
"Rejoice, for in ten turns the Immortal Emperor will bestow His grace upon us and embrace our brothers and sisters so they can serve Him on Holy Terra!
The Celestial Burial ceremony will commence at dawn, in full accordance with tradition. Remember to pay the fee so your loved ones do not have to wait for the next cycle before they can join the Emperor.
Additionally, on this holy day the number of work hours will be reduced by one so the blessed denizens may take part in the solemn march from the Emperor's Spire to the Spire of Stillness."

languages.text:
「めでたきことに、イモータル・エンペラーが我々に慈悲を与え、聖なる地球で御身に仕えられるよう我らが兄弟姉妹を包み込んでくださってから10回転を迎えようとしています！
一切の伝統に則り、天空墓地の式典は夜明けの開始を予定しています。最愛の人を皇帝と共に往ける次の周期まで待たせることのないよう、支払いをお忘れなきよう。
さらに、この聖なる日は労働時間を1時間短縮し、恩寵受けし居住者が皇帝の尖塔から幽寂の尖塔への荘厳な行進に加われるようにいたします」
languages.original_text:
"Rejoice, for in ten turns the Immortal Emperor will bestow His grace upon us and embrace our brothers and sisters so they can serve Him on Holy Terra!
The Celestial Burial ceremony will commence at dawn, in full accordance with tradition. Remember to pay the fee so your loved ones do not have to wait for the next cycle before they can join the Emperor.
Additionally, on this holy day the number of work hours will be reduced by one so the blessed denizens may take part in the solemn march from the Emperor's Spire to the Spire of Stillness."

traits.locale_text:
「めでたきことに、イモータル・エンペラーが我々に慈悲を与え、聖なる地球（テラ）で御身に仕えられるよう我らが兄弟姉妹を包み込んでくださってから10回転を迎えようとしています！
一切の伝統に則り、天空墓地の式典は夜明けの開始を予定しています。最愛の人を皇帝と共に往ける次の周期まで待たせることのないよう、支払いをお忘れなきよう。
さらに、この聖なる日は労働時間を1時間短縮し、恩寵受けし居住者が皇帝の尖塔から幽寂の尖塔への荘厳な行進に加われるようにいたします」

languages.text:
« Réjouissez-vous, car dans dix tours, l'Empereur immortel nous accordera sa grâce et accueillera nos frères et nos sœurs pour qu'ils puissent le servir sur la Sainte Terra !
Les funérailles célestes commenceront à l'aube, comme l'exige la tradition. N'oubliez pas de régler la taxe pour que vos proches n'aient pas à attendre le prochain cycle avant de rejoindre l'Empereur.
En ce jour saint, la journée de travail sera également réduite d'une heure, de façon à permettre aux bienheureux citoyens de participer à la marche solennelle qui partira de la Tour de l'Empereur pour rejoindre celle de la Tranquillité. »
languages.original_text:
"Rejoice, for in ten turns the Immortal Emperor will bestow His grace upon us and embrace our brothers and sisters so they can serve Him on Holy Terra!
The Celestial Burial ceremony will commence at dawn, in full accordance with tradition. Remember to pay the fee so your loved ones do not have to wait for the next cycle before they can join the Emperor.
Additionally, on this holy day the number of work hours will be reduced by one so the blessed denizens may take part in the solemn march from the Emperor's Spire to the Spire of Stillness."

traits.locale_text:
« Réjouissez-vous, car dans dix tours, l'Empereur immortel nous accordera sa grâce et accueillera nos frères et nos sœurs pour qu'ils puissent le servir sur la Sainte Terra !
Les funérailles célestes commenceront à l'aube, comme l'exige la tradition. N'oubliez pas de régler la taxe pour que vos proches n'aient pas à attendre le prochain cycle avant de rejoindre l'Empereur.
En ce jour saint, la journée de travail sera également réduite d'une heure, de façon à permettre aux bienheureux citoyens de participer à la marche solennelle qui partira de la Tour de l'Empereur pour rejoindre celle de la Tranquillité. »

languages.text:
"Seid voller Freude, denn in zehn Umdrehungen wird der unsterbliche Imperator uns seine Gunst gewähren und unsere Brüder und Schwestern umarmen, auf dass sie ihm auf dem Heiligen Terra dienen können!
Die himmlische Begräbniszeremonie beginnt mit der Dämmerung, wie es die Tradition vorsieht. Vergesst nicht, die Gebühr zu bezahlen, damit Eure Lieben nicht auf den nächsten Zyklus warten müssen, bevor sie sich dem Imperator anschließen können.
Außerdem wird die Anzahl der Arbeitsstunden an diesem heiligen Tag um eins reduziert, damit die gesegneten Einwohner an dem feierlichen Marsch vom Turm des Imperators zum Turm der Stille teilnehmen können."
languages.original_text:
"Rejoice, for in ten turns the Immortal Emperor will bestow His grace upon us and embrace our brothers and sisters so they can serve Him on Holy Terra!
The Celestial Burial ceremony will commence at dawn, in full accordance with tradition. Remember to pay the fee so your loved ones do not have to wait for the next cycle before they can join the Emperor.
Additionally, on this holy day the number of work hours will be reduced by one so the blessed denizens may take part in the solemn march from the Emperor's Spire to the Spire of Stillness."

traits.locale_text:
"Seid voller Freude, denn in zehn Umdrehungen wird der unsterbliche Imperator uns seine Gunst gewähren und unsere Brüder und Schwestern umarmen, auf dass sie ihm auf dem Heiligen Terra dienen können!
Die himmlische Begräbniszeremonie beginnt mit der Dämmerung, wie es die Tradition vorsieht. Vergesst nicht, die Gebühr zu bezahlen, damit Eure Lieben nicht auf den nächsten Zyklus warten müssen, bevor sie sich dem Imperator anschließen können.
Außerdem wird die Anzahl der Arbeitsstunden an diesem heiligen Tag um eins reduziert, damit die gesegneten Einwohner an dem feierlichen Marsch vom Turm des Imperators zum Turm der Stille teilnehmen können."

languages.text:
"Kutlamalar başlasın. On devre kadar Ölümsüz İmparator bize lütfunu bahşedecek ve kardeşlerimizi kucaklayarak Kutsal Terra'da O'na hizmet edebilmelerini sağlayacak!"
Göksel Defin töreni, geleneklerimize uygun şekilde şafak vakti gerçekleşecektir. Sevdiklerinizin İmparator'a katılmak için bir sonraki döngüyü beklemesini istemiyorsanız ücretinizi ödemeyi unutmayın.
Ayrıca bu kutsal günde çalışma saatleri bir saat düşürülecektir. Böylece kutsal sakinlerimiz, İmparator'un Kulesi'nden Dinginlik Kulesi'ne kadar yürüme merasimimize katılabilecekler."
languages.original_text:
"Rejoice, for in ten turns the Immortal Emperor will bestow His grace upon us and embrace our brothers and sisters so they can serve Him on Holy Terra!
The Celestial Burial ceremony will commence at dawn, in full accordance with tradition. Remember to pay the fee so your loved ones do not have to wait for the next cycle before they can join the Emperor.
Additionally, on this holy day the number of work hours will be reduced by one so the blessed denizens may take part in the solemn march from the Emperor's Spire to the Spire of Stillness."

traits.locale_text:
"Kutlamalar başlasın zira on devre kadar Ölümsüz İmparator bize lütfunu bahşedecek ve kardeşlerimizi kucaklayarak Kutsal Terra'da O'na hizmet edebilmelerini sağlayacak!"
Göksel Defin töreni, geleneklerimize uygun şekilde şafak vakti gerçekleşecektir. Sevdiklerinizin İmparator'a katılmak için bir sonraki döngüyü beklememesini sağlamak için ücretinizi ödemeyi unutmayın.
Ayrıca bu kutsal günde çalışma saatleri bir saat düşürülecek. Böylece kutsal sakinlerimiz, İmparator'un Kulelerinden Dinginlik Kulelerine kadar yürüme merasimimize katılabilecekler.
